channel.title: Learning Julia on

item.title: Getting Started with Julia
item.description: Getting Started with Julia What is Julia? Welcome to the Julia language project! We’re excited that you’re interested in learning Julia and contributing to our project and community. Julia is a new programming language. It is also a general purpose language, which means that you can find a way to build basically any software in it that you could with another language. However, no programming language is the best tool for every problem.
